definition: inspiring awe, the apparent surface of the imaginary sphere on which celestial bodies appear to be projected
details:
adjective
- inspiring awe
= synonyms: sublime
- of or relating to the sky or heavens
= example: of or relating to the sky or heavens
= synonyms: empyreal
noun
- the apparent surface of the imaginary sphere on which celestial bodies appear to be projected
= synonyms: sphere, celestial sphere, firmament, heavens, welkin
